actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE PUBLIC.JAN31 SET
    USERNAME = '',
    USERHOMEADDRESS = '',
    EMAIL = '',
    USEFAVORITECOLOR = '',
    USERNICKNAME = '',
    PASSWORD = '',
    USERRANK = '',
    USERFAVORITENUMBER = '',
    USER_ID = 1,
    CREATED_ON = '2021-01-01 00:00:01',
    PHONE = 1
  WHERE 1 = 0; -- Specify a valid condition here. Removing the condition may update every row in the table!
